text: 9.2-3 Kis 32.32 Pelpel binɨb yad Yislel okok kɨlop gos nɨgen, yɨp mɨŋel awl yɨbɨl gaknɨŋ gos awl yɨbɨl nepin. Pen yad anɨgɨl gos nepin, God binɨb yad okok kɨlop dɨnɨmuŋ. Anɨb ak Klays ne gos yad ak kɨdek gonɨmuŋ tek lenɨgab, yad nop agnɨŋɨd agebin, Yad binɨb yad nab okok mɨden yɨp dɨyoke mab ke yɨneb ayaŋ pɨsnep amen, binɨb yad okok kɨli tep yad ak dɨnɨgel agebin. Anɨgɨl gɨpɨkop, tep yɨbɨl yobɨkop.
